TITLE: Oral Exam
DEF: Assessments of student knowledge and understanding in dialogue with an instructor
TASK: The Oral Exam pattern leverages verbal questioning and responses to evaluate student knowledge and understanding. It brings to light a student's ability to communicate complex ideas verbally, a skill that is transferrable beyond the academic setting. Yet, the oral exam can be a stressful experience, so creating a supportive environment and providing constructive feedback are key. Clear, well-structured questions that align with the learning objectives are also paramount to effectively use this pattern.
